mapper.select: select /* OtherTenantProductMapping.getTenantProductMapping, 테넌트 상품 매핑 조회, 정희원/SK플래닛 , 2015-01-19 */ PROD_ID AS PROD_ID_S01, CASE WHEN KT_CHECK_YN = 'Y' THEN KT_PROD_ID ELSE NULL END AS PROD_ID_S02, CASE WHEN LG_CHECK_YN = 'Y' THEN LG_PROD_ID ELSE NULL END AS PROD_ID_S03 from TB_DP_SAP_PROD_MAPG WHERE PROD_ID = #{id}
